text: Come Dance with Me is an American reality television dance competition show. It premiered on CBS on April 15, 2022. The show pairs young dancers with a family member that has supported their training. The pair will perform a dance together for a panel of judges before choosing who goes to the next round. The show was created by LL Cool J, Chris O'Donnell, and Reinout Oerlemans. Category:2022 American television series debuts Category:American reality television series
title: Come Dance with Me (TV series)
